attributes.action: to intervene with UEFA on behalf of his deeply-wronged fellow-Scot, Darren Fletcher to ensure he can play in this years Champions League Final.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That the Prime Minister do everything within his power and influence to persuade UEFA to rescind the despicable red given card against Darren Fletcher [a fellow-Scot] in the Champions League Semi-final on May 5th 2009 against Arsenal.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
